typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		Reputation as integer,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		DisplayName as string,
		LastAccessDate as timestamp,
		WebsiteUrl as string,
		Location as string,
		UpVotes as integer,
		DownVotes as integer,
		ProfileImageUrl as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimUser
source(output(
		CommentId as long,
		CommentSk as long,
		CreationDate as string,
		PostId as long,
		Score as long,
		Text as string,
		UserDisplayName as string,
		UserId as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimComments
DimUser, DimComments join(UserSk == DimComments@UserId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join
Join aggregate(groupBy(UserSk,
		CommentSk),
	PostCount = count(1)) ~> Aggregate
Aggregate sink(input(
		IdUser as long,
		IdComment as long,
		PostCount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		IdUser = UserSk,
		IdComment = CommentSk,
		PostCount
	)) ~> Fact
